about_the_game:
Title: 9 Realms: A Thrilling Dungeon Crawler Extraction Game

Introduction:
9 Realms is an immersive and exhilarating dungeon crawler extraction game that takes you and your team on a perilous journey through a series of enchanting realms. Armed with bows and swords, you'll navigate treacherous terrains, battle fierce NPCs and rival characters, all in pursuit of a precious leaf from the legendary Tree of Life. With the leaf in your possession, you'll earn the right to board a ship and escape the realm, securing the loot you've gathered along the way. However, time is of the essence, as failure to escape within a set period will result in the loss of all your hard-earned treasures.

Realm Exploration:
9 Realms presents a diverse range of realms, each with its own distinct theme and challenges. From the chilling ice realm to the scorching fire realm, each environment is meticulously crafted, offering unique landscapes, hazards, and surprises. Prepare to face off against a myriad of non-playable characters (NPCs), formidable bosses, and even other players, as you strive to become the ultimate champion.

Combat and Equipment:
As you delve into the depths of each realm, you'll rely on your prowess with bows and swords to engage in thrilling combat. Whether it's precision archery or close-quarters swordplay, your skills will be put to the test against a variety of adversaries. Defeat NPCs and outsmart rival players to secure powerful weapons, armor, and valuable resources, enhancing your chances of survival and success.

The Quest for the Leaf:
At the heart of 9 Realms lies the elusive leaf from the Tree of Life. This sacred artifact holds the key to your escape from the realm and the preservation of your hard-earned loot. To obtain the leaf, you must overcome numerous challenges, solve intricate puzzles, and conquer powerful foes. Each realm will test your team's strategy, coordination, and resourcefulness, ensuring an immersive and rewarding experience.

Escape or Lose It All:
Time is your greatest enemy in 9 Realms. To secure your treasures, you must reach the extraction point within a predetermined time limit. Failure to do so will result in the loss of all your accumulated loot, forcing you to start anew. This element of risk and urgency adds a thrilling dimension to the gameplay, keeping you on the edge of your seat until the very last second.

Cooperative Gameplay:
9 Realms places a strong emphasis on cooperative play, allowing you to team up with friends or join forces with other players online. Coordinate your strategies, assign roles, and communicate effectively to maximize your chances of success. With teamwork, you can overcome the toughest challenges, share the spoils, and celebrate triumphs together.

Conclusion:
9 Realms offers a captivating and adrenaline-pumping dungeon crawler extraction experience. Embark on an epic adventure through enchanting realms, battling NPCs and rival characters, armed with bows and swords. Your ultimate goal is to secure the precious leaf from the Tree of Life, earning the right to escape the realm and preserve your hard-earned loot. But remember, time is against you, and failure to escape in time means losing everything. Are you ready to face the challenges that await in the 9 Realms?

content_descriptors.notes: Hack and slask general video game fantasy violence with some scenes of non-full-Nudity

name: 9 Realms

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I7-7700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 2080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: I9-10850K
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 3080 RTX

short_description: Embark on an epic journey through the 9 Realms! Immerse yourself in a 3D Multiplayer Viking Fantasy, combining Dungeon Crawling and first-person melee extraction. Customize your hero, raid treacherous dungeons, and pillage the loot off your fallen enemies.
